title: general-something-wrong-on-server
description: One of three servers is down. Indicates that there is something wrong on the server side.

title: widget-you-dont-have-permission
description: A man holding a lock sign. Indicates that you do not have permission to the content.

title: zerodata-charting-not-supported
description: Hierachy diagram with a warning sign. Indicates that charting is not supported for hierachical query. Users need to change to flat list query to use charting feature.

title: zerodata-custom-rules
description: Robot arms building a customized car. Used in Rules area to represent custom rules.

title: zerodata-get-back-to-recent-work
description: Backward clock. Represents recent work.

title: zerodata-invalid-workitem-type
description: Plugs of two different standards that are not compatible with each other. Used when users try to create a work item which type does not exist in the current project.

title: zerodata-keep-an-eye-on-important-work
description: A man looking at some workspace tools. Used to represent all relevant works can be found in one place.

title: zerodata-mention-someone
description: A conversation between two users with an @ in the chat bubble that mimics the mention feature.

title: zerodata-no-charts
description: Several common chart types. Used in Work hub analytics when there is no data to create chart.

title: zerodata-unsaved-query
description: Dotted line charts with save icon. Indicates that charting is not available until you save query.

title: zerodata-workitem-not-found
description: A hammer missing from a set of tools. Indicates that work item is not found or you do not have permission to view it.

title: zerodata-your-work-in-one-place
description: A woman avatar in circle. Used in Account page when you do not have works assigned to you yet.

title: zerodata-get-started-with-sprint
description: 3 people discussing sprint work. Used in Work Sprint page when there is no sprint in the current project.

title: zerodata-add-a-feed
description: A person standing on a ladder and putting a virtual box up on the cloud. Used in the Package page when there is no package feed set up for the current project.

title: zerodata-connect-to-feed
description: A solid box connected to a remote virtual box on the cloud. Used in Package page when there is no packages connected to a feed.

title: general-no-results-found
description: A person looking through a telescope. Used for no results match/found pattern.

title: hero-extend-vside
description: Robot arms building extensions into Visual Studio IDE.

title: swimlane-create-your-own-extension
description: A toolbox with some tools and a cloud.

title: swimlane-marketplace
description: Used to represent Visual Studio Marketplace.

title: swimlane-partner-program
description: Four people riding on a bike. Used for Visual Studio Partner Program.

title: swimlane-what-are-extensions
description: People putting plugins together. Used to represent Visual Studio extensions.

title: zerodata-add-product
description: A woman putting shipping label on a product box. Used to represent add a product.

title: zerodata-configure-component-governance
description: A product box going through x-ray scan. Used to represent configure component governance.

title: zerodata-release-management
description: A rocket on a launch pad. Used for release management.

title: zerodata-this-repository-has-no-tags-yet
description: A dotted line tag on a folder. Used to represent there is no tag on this repository.

title: zerodata-add-deployment-group
description: A map pin on a server. Used to represent targeted deployment group.

title: zerodata-automate-build-definitions
description: A robot arm lifting building blocks. Used to represent build.

title: zerodata-choose-a-template
description: A template with several shapes. Used in Build area for selecting templates.

title: zerodata-cloud-based-load-testing
description: A gauge on a cloud. Used for cloud based load testing.

title: zerodata-favorites
description: Favorite star on frequently used work objects.

title: zerodata-get-everyone-on-same-page
description: People sharing knowledge via wiki.

title: zerodata-no-plan
description: Four hands holding tools and working on a drafting paper. Used when there is no plan for the current project.

title: zerodata-no-variable-groups
description: Stacked blocks with variables. Used when there is no variable group.

title: zerodata-pull-request
description: A person making pull request and asking for code review.

title: hero-swiss-army-knife
description: A Swiss Army knife representing a bundle of developer tools. Used on Visual Studio pricing page for comparing different levels of subscription.

title: swimlane-all-your-code-hosted-free
description: Unlimited Git repository support for individuals and up to four team members. Used on Git page.

title: swimlane-any-client-any-platform
description: Three computers with typical Windows, Mac OS and Linux screens. Used to indicate Git support on any platform and any client on Git page.

title: swimlane-but-wait-theres-more
description: A woman standing on a tree of features. Used on VS Enterprise page.

title: swimlane-pricing
description: Used on pricing pages.

title: swimlane-were-in-your-neighborhood
description: A woman standing in front of a world map. Used to represent data center available around the world.

title: hero-pricing-calculator
description: Used on pricing pages. Bottom shadow removed. Use this version on dark background.

title: nuget-you-have-no-organizations-yet
description: An office space with empty chairs. Used for zero data state when users have not created organizations.

title: general-robot-errorcode-503
description: Used for 503 error page when server is down.

title: general-robot-error
description: Used for generic error page.

title: general-robot-errorcode-400
description: Used for 400 error page bad request.

title: general-robot-errorcode-401
description: Used for 401 error page unauthorized.

title: general-robot-errorcode-403
description: Used for 403 error page the user does not have access.

title: general-robot-errorcode-404
description: Used for 404 error page.

title: general-robot-errorcode-500
description: Used for 500 error page server error.

title: zerodata-no-assessments
description: For assessments page zero data state.

title: zerodata-initializing-test-results
description: Waiting screen image when test result is being loaded.

title: zerodata-no-work-scheduled
description: No work planned in current sprint.

title: sprint-drag-n-drop
description: Used on the Sprint page left panel to indicate there is no work item in the left panel yet.
